nodes.text: Vella was a journalist active during the Imperial Era. When Beol De'Rruyet, head of De'Rruyet Industries, intended to unveil the ancient Nihil device known as the Path engine—supposedly able to unlock a long-lost method of fast lightspeed travel—claiming to be able to replicate the technology, Vella was sent to De'Rruyet HQ to provide a live report.
